config.ohmysplashtext.label.tips: Press "Save Changes" to Refresh the Options
config.ohmysplashtext.option.advancedMod: Enable or Disable the Advanced Options
config.ohmysplashtext.option.rotationFun:
Custom Rotation Animations
n for current timestamp
sin() for sine function
cos() for cosine function
abs() for absolute value
% for mod operator
pi for π
e.g. sin(n/1000*2*pi)*1.5 for 1.5sin(2π(n/1000))
The "Rotation Animation" option needs to be on
config.ohmysplashtext.option.rotationSpe:
Set the Text's Rotation Speed(Degrees Per Second)
The "Rotation Animation" option needs to be on
config.ohmysplashtext.option.splashingFu:
Custom Splashing Animations
n for current timestamp
sin() for sine function
cos() for cosine function
abs() for absolute value
% for mod operator
pi for π
e.g. 0.5+abs(cos(n%(2000/3)/1000*pi*3))*2 for 0.5+2|cos(3π(n%(2000/3)/1000))|
The "Splashing Animation" option needs to be on
config.ohmysplashtext.option.splashingSp:
Set the Text's Splashing Speed
The "Splashing Animation" option needs to be on
config.ohmysplashtext.title: Config Screen
config.ohmysplashtext.option.button.desc: Enable or Disable a Button to the Config Screen in the Title Screen
